title: Did 35,000 soldiers of the Gulf War die from the invasion of anthrax?
subtitle: A controversial film indicates that 35,000 members of this service died as a result of the infestation of anthrax, but we found no reasonable support for such an allegation.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: According to a Government report issued in 2008, 35,000 veterans of the first Gulf war died as a direct result of the harmful effects of the anthrax vaccine they were accused of receiving.
